mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.city as city, a.job as job, a.corporation as corporation, a.contact as contact
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO salary( id, city, job, corporation, contact ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{city}, #{job}, #{corporation}, #{contact} )
mapper.update:

job = #{job},
corporation = #{corporation},
contact = #{contact},
